subject: THANK YOU
body:
Hello my friend,

Good day from here and hope you are good today, I thank you very much for
your kind response and interest to work with me in good faith. In reply to
your good message, I wish to inform you first about the project funds and
how I came across with the amount because you must know the origin or
source of the funds before embarking on the investment itself. Here above
and as used to write to you this message is my direct email address and
once again thank you for your good interest. My name is Mrs. Murat Akume
from Indonesia, I was the financial adviser to the late Mrs. Surati J who
died last year but before her death, there was some funds she deposited
with a financial and security firm without any official next of kin, being
her financial adviser, the firm has notified me to bring her next of kin
otherwise the funds will be used by them so this is the reason I contacted
you to present you as the rightful next of kin in other to invest the funds
wisely into any profitable projects. There is no risk involve, nothing to
lose and I have the vital document of the deposited funds given to me by my
late boss and it is this document that we agreed with the company that must
be presented to them by anyone that is claiming the funds to prove that you
are really from her source. Let me hear from you further before giving you
more details. Thank you and find below my attached identification card.



Sincerely,

Mr. Murat Akume

subject: Re: THANK YOU
body:
Hello Mr. Murat Akume,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing me with this information. I appreciate your trust in considering me as the rightful next of kin for Mrs. Surati's funds. It sounds like an interesting opportunity, and I would like to learn more about it.

Could you please provide me with some additional details regarding the amount of funds that are involved? Also, I would like to know more about the financial and security firm where the funds are currently held. Are they a reputable institution?

Furthermore, could you explain how exactly we would go about investing these funds into profitable projects? What kind of projects do you have in mind? And what would be my role in managing these investments?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Traci

subject: IMPORTANT
body:
Thank you for your prompt response but for us to proceed, I want you to
first of forward to me your valid identificatcation copy and your cell
phone number including your residential address, once I receive these
details from you, I shall proceed in releasing the vital details of the
funds and way forward. Thank you



Sincerely,

Murat

subject: Re: THANK YOU
body:
Hello Mr. Murat Akume,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing me with this information. I appreciate your trust in considering me as the rightful next of kin for Mrs. Surati's funds. It sounds like an interesting opportunity, and I would like to learn more about it.

Could you please provide me with some additional details regarding the amount of funds that were deposited? Also, I would like to know more about the financial and security firm where the funds are currently held. Are they a reputable institution?

Furthermore, could you explain how exactly we would go about investing these funds into profitable projects? What kind of projects are we looking at, and what is the expected return on investment?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Traci

subject: YOUR INFORMATION FIRST
body:
Hello



I asked you to provide for me your valid identification card copy, your
cell phone number and your address, once you provide to me these valid
details, I shall furnish you with all the necessary details that you may
request.
Regards,

Murat Akume

subject: Re: YOUR INFORMATION FIRST
body:
Hello Murat Akume,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to provide me with the necessary details. However, I have a few questions before I can proceed.

1. Can you please clarify what kind of information you are offering? Is it related to a specific topic or service?

2. Why do you require my valid card copy, cell phone number, and address? How will this information be used?

3. Are there any costs or fees associated with accessing the information you mentioned?

I look forward to your response and gaining a better understanding of what you have to offer.

Best wishes,
Traci

subject: Important
body:
Hello

One of your questions made me not to trust you because how can upi not be
talking with someone on phone you are trying to invest funds on his favor?
So you think I can just send to you the funds without your proper id card
copy and your residential address?, so I am not too comfortable with your
questions and if you cannot provide your details as my partner to work with
then no business sir.

Murat Akume

subject: Re: Important
body:
Hello Murat Akume,

Thank you for reaching out. I understand your concern about not being able to talk on the phone before investing funds. However, I believe there are alternative ways to establish trust and proceed with the transaction.

Could you please provide more information about the investment opportunity? What kind of funds are we talking about? And what is the expected return on investment?

Regarding your request for my ID card copy and address, I would like to know why that information is necessary at this stage. Can you explain how it relates to the investment process?

I appreciate your patience in answering these questions. It will help me make an informed decision about moving forward.

Best wishes,
Traci

subject: Re: IMPORTANT
body:
Hello Murat,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response as well. However, before I can provide you with any personal information, I would like to know more about the details of the funds and the purpose of this communication. Could you please share some more information about what this is regarding? Once I have a better understanding, I will be able to proceed accordingly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Traci

subject: VERY IMPORTANT
body:
There is no way you/we/me can do money or investment transactions without
first of all know who you are dealing with, and know much about him before
you embark on the transaction so if you cannot provide to me your valid
details in other to move forward, then it will not go with us all. Thank
you and have a great day.



Murat

subject: AGAIN / Thanks
body:
As I have told you, I cannot give you the vital information of the project
funds without first of all know who you are via your cell phone number,
your id card copy and your official address, this is money investment
business and must be treated in confidentiality.

Thank you again.

Murat

subject: Re: AGAIN / Thanks
body:
Hello Murat,

Thank you for reaching out to me again. I understand that you need certain information from me before proceeding with the project funds. However, I'm a bit hesitant to provide my personal details right away. Can you please explain why you need my cell phone number, ID card copy, and official address? I just want to make sure that everything is legitimate and secure.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Traci

subject: Re: VERY IMPORTANT
body:
Hello Murat,

Thank you for reaching out. I completely understand the importance of knowing who we are dealing with before getting involved in any money or investment opportunities. Could you please provide me with more information about yourself and the opportunity you are referring to? I would like to learn more before making any decisions.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Traci

subject: IMPORTANT
body:
Please and please, I cannot go further with you if you cannot provide your
necessary information as requested earlier.

Murat Akume

subject: Re: IMPORTANT
body:
Hello Murat Akume,

Thank you for reaching out. I apologize if I missed any necessary information earlier. Could you please remind me of what specific details you are looking for? I would be happy to assist you further once I have a clear understanding of your request.

Best wishes,
Traci
